summary: This document is the Operating Agreement for PLAN D, LLC, a limited liability company formed by Jeffrey E. Epstein in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the company's formation, capital structure, management, and provisions for indemnification and dissolution.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Sole Member who formed PLAN D, LLC and is responsible for its management and capital contributions.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Lawrence Visoski is designated as the initial Manager of PLAN D, LLC, responsible for managing the business and affairs of the company.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein, as the Sole Member, employs Lawrence Visoski as the Manager of PLAN D, LLC.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite 15, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: PLAN D, LLC was formed by Jeffrey E. Epstein on October 19, 2012.
The company is organized under the U.S. Virgin Islands Limited Liability Company Act.
Lawrence Visoski is appointed as the initial Manager of the company.
The Sole Member has the authority to manage the company and make decisions regarding its operations.
The agreement includes provisions for indemnification of the Sole Member and Manager against liabilities.
